thread.title: Carl Icahn Puts Washington in His Sights
thread.title_full: Carl Icahn Puts Washington in His Sights - WSJ

author: David Benoit
title: Carl Icahn Puts Washington in His Sights
text:
Carl Icahn is bringing his own brand of activism to Washington.
The 79-year-old investor is famous for his strategy of targeting and publicly berating companies that he thinks are underperforming. Now, he is calling out policy makers.
In a highly orchestrated public relations blitz, including a 15-minute video titled “Danger Ahead,” Mr. Icahn warned that the U.S. is headed toward another financial collapse, urged the Federal... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
